00131 #define EQUIPMENT_COMMON_STR "\
00132 Event ID = WORD : 0\n\
00133 Trigger mask = WORD : 0\n\
00134 Buffer = STRING : [32] SYSTEM\n\
00135 Type = INT : 0\n\
00136 Source = INT : 0\n\
00137 Format = STRING : [8] FIXED\n\
00138 Enabled = BOOL : 0\n\
00139 Read on = INT : 0\n\
00140 Period = INT : 0\n\
00141 Event limit = DOUBLE : 0\n\
00142 Num subevents = DWORD : 0\n\
00143 Log history = INT : 0\n\
00144 Frontend host = STRING : [32] \n\
00145 Frontend name = STRING : [32] \n\
00146 Frontend file name = STRING : [256] \n\
00147 "
00148 
00149 #define EQUIPMENT_STATISTICS_STR "\
00150 Events sent = DOUBLE : 0\n\
00151 Events per sec. = DOUBLE : 0\n\
00152 kBytes per sec. = DOUBLE : 0\n\
00153 "

00155 /********************************************************************/
00156 INT register_equipment(void)
00157 {
00158   INT index, size, status;
00159   char str[256];
00160   EQUIPMENT_INFO *eq_info;
00161   EQUIPMENT_STATS *eq_stats;
00162   HNDLE hKey;
00163 
00164   /* get current ODB run state */
00165   size = sizeof(run_state);
00166   run_state = STATE_STOPPED;
00167   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &run_state, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00168   size = sizeof(run_number);
00169   run_number = 1;
00170   status = db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Run number", &run_number, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00171   assert(status == SUCCESS);
00172 
00173   /* scan EQUIPMENT table from mevb.C */
00174   for (index = 0; equipment[index].name[0]; index++) {
00175     eq_info = &equipment[index].info;
00176     eq_stats = &equipment[index].stats;
00177 
00178     if (eq_info->event_id == 0) {
00179       printf("\nEvent ID 0 for %s not allowed\n", equipment[index].name);
00180       cm_disconnect_experiment();
00181       ss_sleep(5000);
00182       exit(0);
00183     }
00184 
00185     /* init status */
00186     equipment[index].status = EB_SUCCESS;
00187 
00188     sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Common", equipment[index].name);
00189 
00190     /* get last event limit from ODB */
00191     if (eq_info->eq_type != EQ_SLOW) {
00192       db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00193       size = sizeof(double);
00194       if (hKey)
00195         db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Event limit", &eq_info->event_limit, &size,
00196         TID_DOUBLE, TRUE);
00197     }
00198 
00199     /* Create common subtree */
00200     status = db_check_record(hDB, 0, str, EQUIPMENT_COMMON_STR, TRUE);
00201     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00202       printf("Cannot check equipment record, status = %d\n", status);
00203       ss_sleep(3000);
00204     }
00205     db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00206 
00207     if (equal_ustring(eq_info->format, "YBOS"))
00208       equipment[index].format = FORMAT_YBOS;
00209     else if (equal_ustring(eq_info->format, "FIXED"))
00210       equipment[index].format = FORMAT_FIXED;
00211     else    /* default format is MIDAS */
00212       equipment[index].format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00213 
00214     gethostname(eq_info->frontend_host, sizeof(eq_info->frontend_host));
00215     strcpy(eq_info->frontend_name, full_frontend_name);
00216     strcpy(eq_info->frontend_file_name, frontend_file_name);
00217 
00218     /* set record from equipment[] table in frontend.c */
00219     db_set_record(hDB, hKey, eq_info, sizeof(EQUIPMENT_INFO), 0);
00220 
00221     /* get record once at the start equipment info */
00222     size = sizeof(EQUIPMENT_INFO);
00223     db_get_record(hDB, hKey, eq_info, &size, 0);
00224 
00225     /*---- Create just the key , leave it empty ---------------------------------*/
00226     sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Variables", equipment[index].name);
00227     db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00228     db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00229     equipment[index].hkey_variables = hKey;
00230 
00231     /*---- Create and initialize statistics tree -------------------*/
00232     sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Statistics", equipment[index].name);
00233 
00234     status = db_check_record(hDB, 0, str, EQUIPMENT_STATISTICS_STR, TRUE);
00235     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00236       printf("Cannot create/check statistics record, error %d\n", status);
00237       ss_sleep(3000);
00238     }
00239 
00240     status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00241     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00242       printf("Cannot find statistics record, error %d\n", status);
00243       ss_sleep(3000);
00244     }
00245 
00246     eq_stats->events_sent = 0;
00247     eq_stats->events_per_sec = 0;
00248     eq_stats->kbytes_per_sec = 0;
00249 
00250     /* open hot link to statistics tree */
00251     status = db_open_record(hDB, hKey, eq_stats, sizeof(EQUIPMENT_STATS)
00252       , MODE_WRITE, NULL, NULL);
00253     if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00254       cm_msg(MERROR, "register_equipment", 
00255         "Cannot open statistics record, error %d. Probably other FE is using it",
00256         status);
00257       ss_sleep(3000);
00258     }
00259 
00260     /*---- open event buffer ---------------------------------------*/
00261     if (eq_info->buffer[0]) {
00262       status = bm_open_buffer(eq_info->buffer, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE,
00263         &equipment[index].buffer_handle);
00264       if (status != BM_SUCCESS && status != BM_CREATED) {
00265         cm_msg(MERROR, "register_equipment",
00266           "Cannot open event buffer. Try to reduce EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE in midas.h \
00267           and rebuild the system.");
00268         return 0;
00269       }
00270 
00271       /* set the default buffer cache size */
00272       bm_set_cache_size(equipment[index].buffer_handle, 0, SERVER_CACHE_SIZE);
00273     } else {
00274       cm_msg(MERROR, "register_equipment", "Destination buffer must be present");
00275       ss_sleep(3000);
00276       exit(0);
00277     }
00278   }
00279   return SUCCESS;
00280 }
00281 
00282 /********************************************************************/
00283 INT load_fragment(void)
00284 {
00285   INT i, size, type;
00286   HNDLE hEqKey, hSubkey;
00287   EQUIPMENT_INFO *eq_info;
00288   KEY  key;
00289   char  buffer[NAME_LENGTH];
00290   char  format[8];
00291 
00292   /* Get equipment pointer, only one eqp for now */
00293   eq_info = &equipment[0].info;
00294 
00295   /* Scan Equipment/Common listing */
00296   if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "Equipment", &hEqKey) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00297     cm_msg(MINFO, "load_fragment", "Equipment listing not found");
00298     return EB_ERROR;
00299   }
00300 
00301   /* Scan the Equipment list for fragment info collection */
00302   for (i = 0, nfragment=0 ; ; i++) {
00303     db_enum_key(hDB, hEqKey, i, &hSubkey);
00304     if (!hSubkey)
00305       break;
00306     db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00307     if (key.type == TID_KEY) {
00308       /* Equipment name */
00309       if (debug) printf("Equipment name:%s\n", key.name);
00310       /* Check if equipment is EQ_EB */
00311       size = sizeof(INT);
00312       db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "common/type", &type, &size, TID_INT, 0);
00313       size = sizeof(buffer);
00314       db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "common/Buffer", buffer, &size, TID_STRING, 0);
00315       size = sizeof(format);
00316       db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "common/Format", format, &size, TID_STRING, 0);
00317       /* Check if equipment match EB requirements */
00318       if ((type & EQ_EB)
00319         && (strncmp(buffer, buffer_name, strlen(buffer_name)) == 0)
00320         && (strncmp(format, eq_info->format, strlen(format)) == 0)) {
00321           /* match=> fill internal eb structure */
00322           strcpy(ebch[nfragment].format, format);
00323           strcpy(ebch[nfragment].buffer, buffer);
00324           size = sizeof(WORD);
00325           db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "common/Trigger Mask", &ebch[nfragment].trigger_mask, &size, TID_WORD, 0);
00326           size = sizeof(WORD);
00327           db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "common/Event ID", &ebch[nfragment].event_id, &size, TID_WORD, 0);
00328           nfragment++;
00329         }
00330     }
00331   }
00332 
00333   printf("Found %d fragment matching EB setting\n", nfragment);
00334   /* Point to the Ebuilder settings */
00335   /* Set fragment_add function based on the format */
00336   if (equipment[0].format == FORMAT_MIDAS)
00337     meb_fragment_add = eb_mfragment_add;
00338   else if (equipment[0].format == FORMAT_YBOS)
00339     meb_fragment_add = eb_yfragment_add;
00340   else {
00341     cm_msg(MERROR, "mevb", "Unknown data format :%d", format);
00342     return EB_ERROR;
00343   }
00344 
00345   /* allocate destination event buffer */
00346   dest_event = (char *) malloc(nfragment * (max_event_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER)));
00347   memset(dest_event, 0, nfragment * (max_event_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER)));
00348   if (dest_event == NULL) {
00349     cm_msg(MERROR, "EBuilder", "%s: Not enough memory for event buffer", full_frontend_name);
00350     return EB_ERROR;
00351   }
00352   return EB_SUCCESS;
00353 }
00354 
00355 /********************************************************************/
00356 INT scan_fragment(void)
00357 {
00358   INT fragn, status;
00359   EQUIPMENT *eq;
00360   EQUIPMENT_INFO *eq_info;
00361 
00362   /* Get equipment pointer, only one eqp for now */
00363   eq_info = &equipment[0].info;
00364 
00365   /* Main event loop */
00366   do {
00367     switch (run_state) {
00368       case STATE_STOPPED:
00369       case STATE_PAUSED:
00370         /* skip the source scan and yield */
00371         status = cm_yield(500);
00372         if (wheel) {
00373           printf("...%c Snoring\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4]);
00374           fflush(stdout);
00375         }
00376         break;
00377       case STATE_RUNNING:
00378         status = source_scan(equipment[0].format, eq_info);
00379         switch (status) {
00380             case BM_ASYNC_RETURN:  // No event found for now, Check for timeout 
00381               for (fragn = 0; fragn < nfragment; fragn++) {
00382                 if (ebch[fragn].timeout > TIMEOUT) {        /* Timeout */
00383                   if (stop_requested) {                     /* Stop */
00384                     if (debug) printf("Stop requested on timeout %d\n", status);
00385                       status = close_buffers();
00386                     break;
00387                   } 
00388                   else {         /* No stop requested  but timeout */
00389                     if (wheel) {
00390                       printf("...%c Timoing on %1.0lf\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4],
00391                         eq->stats.events_sent);
00392                       fflush(stdout);
00393                       status = cm_yield(50);
00394                     }
00395                   }
00396                 }
00397                 //else { /* No timeout loop back */
00398               } // for loop over all fragments
00399               break;
00400             case EB_ERROR:
00401             case EB_USER_ERROR:
00402               abort_requested = TRUE;
00403               if (status == EB_USER_ERROR)
00404                 cm_msg(MTALK, "EBuilder", "%s: Error signaled by user code - stopping run...", full_frontend_name);
00405               else
00406                 cm_msg(MTALK, "EBuilder", "%s: Event mismatch - Stopping run...", full_frontend_name);
00407               if (cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, ASYNC, 0) != CM_SUCCESS) {
00408                 cm_msg(MERROR, "EBuilder", "%s: Stop Transition request failed", full_frontend_name);
00409                 return status;
00410               }
00411               if (debug) printf("Stop requested on Error %d\n", status);
00412               status = close_buffers();
00413               return status;
00414               break;
00415             case EB_SUCCESS:
00416             case EB_SKIP:
00417               //   Normal path if event has been assembled
00418               //   No yield in this case.
00419               break;
00420             default:
00421               cm_msg(MERROR, "Source_scan", "unexpected return %d", status);
00422               status = SS_ABORT;
00423               }  // switch scan_source
00424         break;
00425     }
00426     /* EB job done, update statistics if its time */
00427     /* Check if it's time to do statistics job */
00428     if ((actual_millitime = ss_millitime()) - last_time > 1000) {
00429       /* Force event to appear at the destination if Ebuilder is remote */
00430       rpc_flush_event();
00431       /* Force event ot appear at the destination if Ebuilder is local */
00432       bm_flush_cache(equipment[0].buffer_handle, ASYNC);
00433 
00434       status = cm_yield(10);
00435 
00436       eq = &equipment[0];
00437       eq->stats.events_sent += eq->events_sent;
00438       eq->stats.events_per_sec =
00439         eq->events_sent / ((actual_millitime - last_time) / 1000.0);
00440       eq->stats.kbytes_per_sec =
00441         eq->bytes_sent / 1024.0 / ((actual_millitime - last_time) /
00442         1000.0);
00443       eq->bytes_sent = 0;
00444       eq->events_sent = 0;
00445       /* update destination statistics */
00446       db_send_changed_records();
00447       /* Keep track of last ODB update */
00448       last_time = ss_millitime();
00449     }
00450   } while (status != RPC_SHUTDOWN && status != SS_ABORT);
00451 
00452   return status;
00453   }
00454 
00455 /********************************************************************/
00456 INT eb_mfragment_add(char *pdest, char *psrce, INT * size)
00457 {
00458    BANK_HEADER *psbh, *pdbh;
00459    char *psdata, *pddata;
00460    INT bksize;
00461 
00462    /* Condition for new EVENT the data_size should be ZERO */
00463    *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size;
00464 
00465    /* destination pointer */
00466    pddata = pdest + *size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
00467 
00468    if (*size) {
00469       /* NOT the first fragment */
00470 
00471       /* Swap event source if necessary */
00472       psbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce) + 1);
00473       bk_swap(psbh, FALSE);
00474 
00475       /* source pointer */
00476       psbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce) + 1);
00477       psdata = (char *) (psbh + 1);
00478 
00479       /* copy all banks without the bank header */
00480       bksize = psbh->data_size;
00481 
00482       /* copy */
00483       memcpy(pddata, psdata, bksize);
00484 
00485       /* update event size */
00486       ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size += bksize;
00487 
00488       /* update bank size */
00489       pdbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest) + 1);
00490       pdbh->data_size += bksize;
00491 
00492       *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size;
00493    } else {
00494       /* First event without the event header but with the 
00495          bank header as the size is zero */
00496       *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce)->data_size;
00497 
00498       /* Swap event if necessary */
00499       psbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce) + 1);
00500       bk_swap(psbh, FALSE);
00501 
00502       /* copy first fragment */
00503       memcpy(pddata, psbh, *size);
00504 
00505       /* update destination event size */
00506       ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size = *size;
00507    }
00508    return CM_SUCCESS;
00509 }
00510 
00511 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00512 INT eb_yfragment_add(char *pdest, char *psrce, INT * size)
00513 {
00514    /* pdest : EVENT_HEADER pointer
00515       psrce : EVENT_HEADER pointer
00516       Keep pbkh for later incrementation
00517     */
00518    char *psdata, *pddata;
00519    DWORD *pslrl, *pdlrl;
00520    INT i4frgsize, i1frgsize, status;
00521 
00522    /* Condition for new EVENT the data_size should be ZERO */
00523    *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size;
00524 
00525    /* destination pointer skip the header as it has been already
00526       composed and the usere may have modified it on purpose (Midas Control) */
00527    pddata = pdest + *size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
00528 
00529    /* the Midas header is present for logger */
00530    if (*size) {                 /* already filled with a fragment */
00531 
00532       /* source pointer: number of DWORD (lrl included) */
00533       pslrl = (DWORD *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce) + 1);
00534 
00535       /* Swap event if necessary */
00536       status = ybos_event_swap(pslrl);
00537 
00538       /* copy done in bytes, do not include LRL */
00539       psdata = (char *) (pslrl + 1);
00540 
00541       /* copy size in I*4 (lrl included, remove it) */
00542       i4frgsize = (*pslrl);
00543       i1frgsize = 4 * i4frgsize;
00544 
00545       /* append fragment */
00546       memcpy(pddata, psdata, i1frgsize);
00547 
00548       /* update Midas header event size */
00549       ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size += i1frgsize;
00550 
00551       /* update LRL size (I*4) */
00552       pdlrl = (DWORD *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest) + 1);
00553       *pdlrl += i4frgsize;
00554 
00555       /* Return event size in bytes */
00556       *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size;
00557    } else {                     /* new destination event */
00558       /* The composed event has already the MIDAS header.
00559          which may have been modified by the user in ebuser.c
00560          Will be stripped by the logger (YBOS).
00561          Copy the first full event ( no EVID suppression )
00562          First event (without the event header) */
00563 
00564       /* source pointer */
00565       pslrl = (DWORD *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce) + 1);
00566 
00567       /* Swap event if necessary */
00568       status = ybos_event_swap(pslrl);
00569 
00570       /* size in byte from the source midas header */
00571       *size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) psrce)->data_size;
00572 
00573       /* copy first fragment */
00574       memcpy(pddata, (char *) pslrl, *size);
00575 
00576       /* update destination Midas header event size */
00577       ((EVENT_HEADER *) pdest)->data_size += *size;
00578 
00579    }
00580    return CM_SUCCESS;
00581 }
00582 
00583 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00584 INT tr_start(INT rn, char *error)
00585 {
00586   EBUILDER(ebuilder_str);
00587   INT status, size, i;
00588   char   str[128];
00589   KEY    key;
00590   HNDLE  hKey, hEqkey, hEqFRkey;
00591   EQUIPMENT_INFO *eq_info;
00592   
00593 
00594   eq_info = &equipment[0].info;
00595 
00596   /* Get update eq_info from ODB */
00597   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Common", equipment[0].name);
00598   status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00599   size = sizeof(EQUIPMENT_INFO);
00600   db_get_record(hDB, hKey, eq_info, &size, 0);
00601 
00602   ebset.nfragment = nfragment;
00603 
00604   /* reset serial numbers */
00605   for (i = 0; equipment[i].name[0]; i++) {
00606     equipment[i].serial_number = 1;
00607     equipment[i].subevent_number = 0;
00608     equipment[i].stats.events_sent = 0;
00609     equipment[i].odb_in = equipment[i].odb_out = 0;
00610   }
00611 
00612   /* Get / Set Settings */
00613   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings", equipment[0].name);
00614   if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hEqkey) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00615     status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, str, strcomb(ebuilder_str));
00616   }
00617 
00618   /* Keep Key on Ebuilder/Settings */
00619   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings", equipment[0].name);
00620   if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hEqkey) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00621     cm_msg(MINFO, "load_fragment", "/Equipment/%s/Settings not found", equipment[0].name);
00622   }
00623   
00624   /* Update or Create User_field */
00625   size = sizeof(ebset.user_field);
00626   status = db_get_value(hDB, hEqkey, "User Field", ebset.user_field, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00627 
00628   /* Update or Create User_Build */
00629   size = sizeof(ebset.user_build);
00630   status = db_get_value(hDB, hEqkey, "User Build", &ebset.user_build, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00631 
00632   /* update ODB */
00633   size = sizeof(INT);
00634   status = db_set_value(hDB, hEqkey, "Number of Fragment", &ebset.nfragment, size, 1, TID_INT);  
00635 
00636     /* Create or update the fragment request list */
00637   status = db_find_key(hDB, hEqkey, "Fragment Required", &hEqFRkey);
00638   status = db_get_key (hDB, hEqFRkey, &key);
00639   if (key.num_values != ebset.nfragment) {
00640     cm_msg(MINFO, "mevb", "Number of Fragment mismatch ODB:%d - CUR:%d", key.num_values, ebset.nfragment);
00641     free (ebset.preqfrag);
00642     size = ebset.nfragment*sizeof(BOOL);
00643     ebset.preqfrag = malloc(size);
00644     for (i=0 ; i<ebset.nfragment ; i++)
00645       ebset.preqfrag[i] = TRUE;
00646     status = db_set_value(hDB, hEqkey, "Fragment Required", ebset.preqfrag, size, ebset.nfragment, TID_BOOL);  
00647   } else {  // Take from ODBedit
00648     size = key.total_size;
00649     free (ebset.preqfrag);
00650     ebset.preqfrag = malloc(size);
00651     status = db_get_data(hDB, hEqkey, ebset.preqfrag, &size, TID_BOOL);
00652   }
00653   /* Cleanup fragment flags */
00654   free (ebset.received);
00655   ebset.received = malloc(size);
00656   for (i=0 ; i < ebset.nfragment ; i++) 
00657     ebset.received[i] = FALSE;
00658 
00659   /* Call BOR user function */
00660   status = eb_begin_of_run(run_number, ebset.user_field, error);
00661   if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
00662     cm_msg(MERROR, "eb_prestart", "run start aborted due to eb_begin_of_run (%d)",
00663       status);
00664     return status;
00665   }
00666 
00667   /* Book all fragment */
00668   status = source_booking();
00669   if (status != SUCCESS)
00670     return status;
00671 
00672   /* local run state */
00673   run_state = STATE_RUNNING;
00674   run_number = rn;
00675   stop_requested = FALSE;
00676   abort_requested = FALSE;
00677   printf("%s-Starting New Run: %d\n", full_frontend_name, rn);
00678 
00679   /* Reset global trigger mask */
00680   return CM_SUCCESS;
00681 }
00682 
00683 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00684 INT tr_stop(INT rn, char *error)
00685 {
00686    printf("\n%s-Stopping Run: %d detected\n", full_frontend_name, rn);
00687 
00688    /* local stop */
00689    stop_requested = TRUE;
00690 
00691    /* local stop time */
00692    request_stop_time = ss_millitime();
00693    return CM_SUCCESS;
00694 }
00695 
00696 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00697 void free_event_buffer(INT nfrag)
00698 {
00699    INT i;
00700    for (i = 0; i < nfrag; i++) {
00701       if (ebch[i].pfragment) {
00702          free(ebch[i].pfragment);
00703          ebch[i].pfragment = NULL;
00704       }
00705    }
00706 }
00707 
00708 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00709 INT handFlush()
00710 {
00711    int i, size, status;
00712    char strout[256];
00713 
00714    /* Do Hand flush until better way to  garantee the input buffer to be empty */
00715    if (debug)
00716       printf("Hand flushing system buffer... \n");
00717    for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
00718       do {
00719          size = max_event_size;
00720          status = bm_receive_event(ebch[i].hBuf, ebch[i].pfragment, &size, ASYNC);
00721          if (debug1) {
00722             sprintf(strout,
00723                     "booking:Hand flush bm_receive_event[%d] hndle:%d stat:%d  Last Ser:%d",
00724                     i, ebch[i].hBuf, status,
00725                     ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->serial_number);
00726             printf("%s\n", strout);
00727          }
00728       } while (status == BM_SUCCESS);
00729    }
00730 
00731    /* Empty source buffer */
00732    status = bm_empty_buffers();
00733    if (status != BM_SUCCESS)
00734       cm_msg(MERROR, "handFlush", "bm_empty_buffers failure [%d]", status);
00735    run_state = STATE_STOPPED;
00736    return status;
00737 }
00738 
00739 
00740 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00741 INT source_booking()
00742 {
00743    INT j, i, status, status1, status2;
00744 
00745    if (debug)
00746       printf("Entering booking\n");
00747 
00748    /* Book all the source channels */
00749    for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
00750       /* Book only the requested event mask */
00751      if (ebset.preqfrag[i]) {
00752          /* Connect channel to source buffer */
00753          status1 = bm_open_buffer(ebch[i].buffer, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE, &(ebch[i].hBuf));
00754 
00755          if (debug)
00756            printf("bm_open_buffer frag:%d buf:%s handle:%d stat:%d\n",
00757                    i, ebch[i].buffer, ebch[i].hBuf, status1);
00758          /* Register for specified channel event ID and Trigger mask */
00759          status2 =
00760              bm_request_event(ebch[i].hBuf, ebch[i].event_id,
00761                               ebch[i].trigger_mask, GET_ALL, &ebch[i].req_id, NULL);
00762          if (debug)
00763            printf("bm_request_event frag:%d id:%d msk:%d req_id:%d stat:%d\n",
00764                    i, ebch[i].event_id, ebch[i].trigger_mask, ebch[i].req_id, status2);
00765          if (((status1 != BM_SUCCESS) && (status1 != BM_CREATED)) ||
00766              ((status2 != BM_SUCCESS) && (status2 != BM_CREATED))) {
00767             cm_msg(MERROR, "source_booking",
00768                    "Open buffer/event request failure [%d %d %d]", i, status1, status2);
00769             return BM_CONFLICT;
00770          }
00771 
00772          /* allocate local source event buffer */
00773          if (ebch[i].pfragment)
00774             free(ebch[i].pfragment);
00775          ebch[i].pfragment = (char *) malloc(max_event_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
00776          if (debug)
00777             printf("malloc pevent frag:%d pevent:%p\n", i, ebch[i].pfragment);
00778          if (ebch[i].pfragment == NULL) {
00779             free_event_buffer(nfragment);
00780             cm_msg(MERROR, "source_booking", "Can't allocate space for buffer");
00781             return BM_NO_MEMORY;
00782          }
00783       }
00784    }
00785 
00786    /* Empty source buffer */
00787    status = bm_empty_buffers();
00788    if (status != BM_SUCCESS) {
00789       cm_msg(MERROR, "source_booking", "bm_empty_buffers failure [%d]", status);
00790       return status;
00791    }
00792 
00793    if (debug) {
00794       printf("bm_empty_buffers stat:%d\n", status);
00795       for (j = 0; j < ebset.nfragment; j++) {
00796          printf(" buff:%s", ebch[j].buffer);
00797          printf(" ser#:%d", ebch[j].serial);
00798          printf(" hbuf:%2d", ebch[j].hBuf);
00799          printf(" rqid:%2d", ebch[j].req_id);
00800          printf(" opst:%d", status1);
00801          printf(" rqst:%d", status2);
00802          printf(" evid:%2d", ebch[j].event_id);
00803          printf(" tmsk:0x%4.4x\n", ebch[j].trigger_mask);
00804       }
00805    }
00806 
00807    return SUCCESS;
00808 }
00809 
00810 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00811 INT source_unbooking()
00812 {
00813    INT i, status;
00814 
00815    /* Skip unbooking if already done */
00816    if (ebch[0].pfragment == NULL)
00817       return EB_SUCCESS;
00818 
00819    /* unbook all source channels */
00820    for (i = 0; i< nfragment; i++) {
00821       bm_empty_buffers();
00822 
00823       /* Remove event ID registration */
00824       status = bm_delete_request(ebch[i].req_id);
00825       if (debug)
00826          printf("unbook: bm_delete_req[%d] req_id:%d stat:%d\n", i, ebch[i].req_id,
00827                 status);
00828 
00829       /* Close source buffer */
00830       status = bm_close_buffer(ebch[i].hBuf);
00831       if (debug)
00832          printf("unbook: bm_close_buffer[%d] hndle:%d stat:%d\n", i, ebch[i].hBuf,
00833                 status);
00834       if (status != BM_SUCCESS) {
00835          cm_msg(MERROR, "source_unbooking", "Close buffer[%d] stat:", i, status);
00836          return status;
00837       }
00838    }
00839 
00840    /* release local event buffer memory */
00841    free_event_buffer(nfragment);
00842 
00843    return EB_SUCCESS;
00844 }
00845 
00846 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00847 INT close_buffers(void)
00848 {
00849   INT status;
00850   char error[256];
00851   EQUIPMENT *eq;
00852 
00853   eq = &equipment[0];
00854 
00855   /* Flush local destination cache */
00856   bm_flush_cache(equipment[0].buffer_handle, SYNC);
00857   /* Call user function */
00858   eb_end_of_run(run_number, error);
00859   /* Cleanup buffers */
00860   handFlush();
00861   /* Detach all source from midas */
00862   status = source_unbooking();
00863 
00864   /* Compose message */
00865   stop_time = ss_millitime() - request_stop_time;
00866   sprintf(error, "Run %d Stop after %1.0lf events sent DT:%d[ms]",
00867     run_number, eq->stats.events_sent, stop_time);
00868   cm_msg(MINFO, "EBuilder", "%s", error);
00869 
00870   run_state = STATE_STOPPED;
00871   abort_requested = FALSE;
00872   return status;
00873 }
00874 
00875 /********************************************************************/
00897 INT source_scan(INT fmt, EQUIPMENT_INFO *eq_info)
00898 {
00899    static char bars[] = "|/-\\";
00900    static int i_bar;
00901    static DWORD serial;
00902    DWORD *plrl;
00903    BOOL   complete;
00904    INT i, j, status, size;
00905    INT act_size;
00906    BOOL found, event_mismatch;
00907    BANK_HEADER *psbh;
00908 
00909    /* Scan all channels at least once */
00910    for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
00911       /* Check if current channel needs to be received */
00912      if (ebset.preqfrag[i] && !ebset.received[i]) {
00913          /* Get fragment and store it in ebch[i].pfragment */
00914          size = max_event_size;
00915          status = bm_receive_event(ebch[i].hBuf, ebch[i].pfragment, &size, ASYNC);
00916          switch (status) {
00917          case BM_SUCCESS:      /* event received */
00918             /* Mask event */
00919             ebset.received[i] = TRUE;
00920             /* Keep local serial */
00921             ebch[i].serial = ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->serial_number;
00922 
00923             /* Swap event depending on data format */
00924             switch (fmt) {
00925             case FORMAT_YBOS:
00926                plrl = (DWORD *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment) + 1);
00927                ybos_event_swap(plrl);
00928                break;
00929             case FORMAT_MIDAS:
00930                psbh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment) + 1);
00931                bk_swap(psbh, FALSE);
00932                break;
00933             }
00934 
00935             if (debug1) {
00936               printf("SUCC: ch:%d ser:%d rec:%d sz:%d\n", i,
00937                       ebch[i].serial, ebset.received[i], size);
00938             }
00939             break;
00940          case BM_ASYNC_RETURN: /* timeout */
00941             ebch[i].timeout++;
00942             if (debug1) {
00943               printf("ASYNC: ch:%d ser:%d rec:%d sz:%d\n", i,
00944                       ebch[i].serial, ebset.received[i], size);
00945             }
00946             break;
00947          default:              /* Error */
00948             cm_msg(MERROR, "event_scan", "bm_receive_event error %d", status);
00949             return status;
00950             break;
00951          }
00952       }    /* next channel */
00953    }
00954 
00955    /* Check if all fragments have been received */
00956    complete = FALSE;
00957    for (i = 0; i < nfragment;i++) {
00958      if (ebset.preqfrag[i] && !ebset.received[i])
00959        break;
00960    }
00961    if (i == nfragment) {
00962      complete = TRUE;
00963      /* Check if serial matches */
00964      found = event_mismatch = FALSE;
00965      /* Check Serial, mark first serial */
00966      for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
00967          if (ebset.preqfrag[i] && ebset.received[i] && !found) {
00968             serial = ebch[i].serial;
00969             found = TRUE;
00970          } else {
00971             if (ebset.preqfrag[i] && ebset.received[i] && (serial != ebch[i].serial)) {
00972                /* Event mismatch */
00973                event_mismatch = TRUE;
00974             }
00975          }
00976       }
00977 
00978     /* internal action in case of event mismatch */
00979      if (event_mismatch && debug) {
00980        char str[256];
00981        char strsub[128];
00982        strcpy(str, "event mismatch: ");
00983        for (j = 0; j < nfragment; j++) {
00984          sprintf(strsub, "Ser[%d]:%d ", j, ebch[j].serial);
00985          strcat(str, strsub);
00986        }
00987        printf("event serial mismatch %s\n", str);
00988      }
00989 
00990      /* In any case reset destination buffer */
00991      memset(dest_event, 0, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
00992      act_size = 0;
00993 
00994      /* Fill reserved header space of destination event with
00995      final header information */
00996      bm_compose_event((EVENT_HEADER *) dest_event, eq_info->event_id, eq_info->trigger_mask,
00997        act_size, ebch[0].serial);
00998 
00999      /* Pass fragments to user with mismatch flag, for final check before assembly */
01000      status = eb_user(nfragment, event_mismatch, ebch
01001        , (EVENT_HEADER *) dest_event,(void *) ((EVENT_HEADER *) dest_event + 1), &act_size);
01002      if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
01003        if (status == EB_SKIP) {
01004          /* Reset mask and timeouts as even thave been succesfully send */
01005          for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
01006            ebch[i].timeout = 0;
01007            ebset.received[i] = FALSE;
01008          }
01009        }
01010        return status;        // Event mark as EB_SKIP or EB_ABORT by user
01011      }
01012 
01013      /* Allow bypass of fragment assembly if user did it on its own */
01014      if (!ebset.user_build) {
01015        for (j = 0; j < nfragment; j++) {
01016          status = meb_fragment_add(dest_event, ebch[j].pfragment, &act_size);
01017          if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
01018            cm_msg(MERROR, "source_scan",
01019              "compose fragment:%d current size:%d (%d)", j, act_size, status);
01020            return EB_ERROR;
01021          }
01022        }
01023      }
01024 
01025      /* Overall event to be sent */
01026      act_size = ((EVENT_HEADER *) dest_event)->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
01027 
01028      /* Send event and wait for completion */
01029      status = rpc_send_event(equipment[0].buffer_handle, dest_event, act_size, SYNC);
01030      if (status != BM_SUCCESS) {
01031        if (debug)
01032          printf("rpc_send_event returned error %d, event_size %d\n",
01033          status, act_size);
01034        cm_msg(MERROR, "EBuilder", "%s: rpc_send_event returned error %d", full_frontend_name, status);
01035        return EB_ERROR;
01036      }
01037 
01038      /* Keep track of the total byte count */
01039      equipment[0].bytes_sent += act_size;
01040 
01041      /* update destination event count */
01042      equipment[0].events_sent++;
01043 
01044      /* Reset mask and timeouts as even thave been succesfully send */
01045      for (i = 0; i < nfragment; i++) {
01046        ebch[i].timeout = 0;
01047        ebset.received[i] = FALSE;
01048      }
01049    } // all fragment recieved for this event
01050 
01051    return status;
01052 }
01053 
01054 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01055 int main(unsigned int argc, char **argv)
01056 {
01057   INT status;
01058   unsigned int i;
01059   BOOL daemon = FALSE;
01060   
01061   /* init structure */
01062   memset(&ebch[0], 0, sizeof(ebch));
01063 
01064   /* set default */
01065   cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), expt_name, sizeof(expt_name));
01066 
01067   /* get parameters */
01068   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
01069     if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'd')
01070       debug = TRUE;
01071     else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'D')
01072       daemon = TRUE;
01073     else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'w')
01074       wheel = TRUE;
01075     else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
01076       if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
01077         goto usage;
01078       if (strncmp(argv[i], "-e", 2) == 0)
01079         strcpy(expt_name, argv[++i]);
01080       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) == 0)
01081         strcpy(host_name, argv[++i]);
01082       else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-b", 2) == 0)
01083         strcpy(buffer_name, argv[++i]);
01084     } else {
01085 usage:
01086       printf("usage: mevb [-h <Hostname>] [-e <Experiment>] -b <buffername> [-d debug]\n");
01087       printf("             -w show wheel -D to start as a daemon\n\n");
01088       return 0;
01089     }
01090   }
01091 
01092   printf("Program mevb version 5 started\n\n");
01093   if (daemon) {
01094     printf("Becoming a daemon...\n");
01095     ss_daemon_init(FALSE);
01096   }
01097 
01098   /* Check buffer arg */
01099   if (buffer_name[0] == 0) {
01100     printf("Buffer name must be specified with -b argument\n");
01101     goto exit;
01102   }
01103 
01104   /* Compose frontend name */
01105    strcpy(full_frontend_name, frontend_name);
01106 
01107   /* Connect to experiment */
01108   status = cm_connect_experiment(host_name, expt_name, full_frontend_name, NULL);
01109   if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
01110     ss_sleep(5000);
01111     goto exit;
01112   }
01113 
01114   if (debug)
01115     cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
01116 
01117   /* Connect to ODB */
01118   status = cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
01119   if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
01120     ss_sleep(5000);
01121     goto exit;
01122   }
01123   
01124   /* check if Ebuilder is already running */
01125   status = cm_exist(full_frontend_name, TRUE);
01126   if (status == CM_SUCCESS) {
01127     cm_msg(MERROR, "Ebuilder", "%s running already!.", full_frontend_name);
01128     cm_disconnect_experiment();
01129     goto exit;
01130   }
01131 
01132   if (ebuilder_init() != SUCCESS) {
01133     cm_disconnect_experiment();
01134     /* let user read message before window might close */
01135     ss_sleep(5000);
01136     goto exit;
01137   }
01138 
01139   /* Register single equipment */
01140   status = register_equipment();
01141   if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
01142     ss_sleep(5000);
01143     goto exit;
01144   }
01145 
01146   /* Load Fragment info */
01147   status = load_fragment();
01148   if (status != EB_SUCCESS) {
01149     ss_sleep(5000);
01150     goto exit;
01151   }
01152 
01153   /* Register transition for reset counters */
01154   if (cm_register_transition(TR_START, tr_start, 300) != CM_SUCCESS)
01155     return status;
01156   if (cm_register_transition(TR_STOP, tr_stop, 700) != CM_SUCCESS)
01157     goto exit;
01158 
01159   /* Scan fragments... will stay in */
01160   status = scan_fragment();
01161   printf("%s-Out of scan_fragment\n", full_frontend_name);
01162 
01163   /* Detach all source from midas */
01164   printf("%s-Unbooking\n", full_frontend_name);
01165   source_unbooking();
01166   
01167   ebuilder_exit();
01168 
01169 exit:
01170   /* Free local memory */
01171   free_event_buffer(ebset.nfragment);
01172 
01173   /* Clean disconnect from midas */
01174   cm_disconnect_experiment();
01175   return 0;
01176 }
